chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro is experiencing the issue described above.

Thank you for your help,


Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 business days to process your refund (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer meets all of the following conditions:

✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Has confirmed having a return label.
✔ Understands they must include accessories as well as proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 business days to process your refund (if you're eligible).

Dear Backcare,

The order has been successfully cancelled and the customer has been refunded.

Regards,
JY
